title: Incorrect enablement of "Build" popup action
description: There seems to be an issue with the enablement of the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective.
OB: Currently, the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should be enabled only when there is a buildable resource present.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Right-click anywhere in the Java Editor.
3. Observe that the "Build" action is always enabled, even when there are no buildable resources present.
